HiddenText.Name: What are some important things to know about my contract?
HiddenText.OpenningText: What are some important things to know about my contract?
HiddenText.BodyCopy:
Please be sure to update your contact information each time you are sent a contract. Initial, noting that you have updated your information, and check to verify your future availability.
If your contract is not returned within two weeks, we will assume that you do not plan to teach the course, and we will find a replacement instructor. If you have any additional questions, contact Pat Saurey:Â saureyp@byui.edu
